name: Triad Smash
description:
The poor citizens of Trinity Island desperately need your help! The evil Triad forces have turned their once beautiful home into a total wasteland of destruction and garbage. Some citizens have formed a rebellion against their oppressors, but they lack an able leader to make a major breakthrough. Do you have what it takes to lead them to freedom?

_________________

FIGHT EPIC BATTLES

Get ready for some serious street battles, featuring bullet showers, collapsing buildings and exploding cars that will blast Triad thugs halfway across streets. This game guarantees an almost inexhaustible supply of challenging action.

_________________

STRATEGIZE

Use advanced techniques, such as squad formations, cover, specialist soldiers, and more to outsmart your enemy.

_________________

PROGRESSION

Fight through an epic campaign with a large selection of vehicles, weapons and a growing army of rebels at your disposal.

_________________

THE OPEN WORLD

Liberate homes & entire cities from the tyrannical Triads. Work side jobs for extra cash and find hidden locations scattered across the island.

_________________

KEY FEATURES OVERVIEW

• A 14-part campaign to victory, with lots of side-jobs
• Collect cars, planes, and helicopters to assist you on your journey
• Explore 17 cities in a large and dynamic open world
• Fight heavily armed Triads
• Upgrade various different skill sets
• Lead a team of customizable soldiers (Patriots)
• Lots of weapons (including a tank and attack helicopter)
• Discover hidden secrets
• Powerful combat visuals and audio
• Lots more to come in future updates!
